English Sentences: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, and Timotheus our brother,
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani PHauloosi, Xoossaa sheniyan Kiristtoosi Yesuusi kiittidoogaa gididaageenne nu ishai Ximootiyoosi,

English Sentences: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qolasiyaasa giyo kataman de7iya geeshshatuyyo, Kiristtoosan ammanettida ishanttuyyo ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafoos. Xoossaa nu Aawaappenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe, aaro kehatettainne sarotettai intteyyo gido.

English Sentences: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, praying always for you,
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni intteyyo Xoossaa woossiyo wode, Xoossaa nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa Aawaa, ubba wode galatoos.

English Sentences: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus, and of the love which ye have to all the saints,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, nuuni Kiristtoos Yesuusa intte ammaniyoogaanne geeshshata ubbaa siiqiyoogaa siyida.

English Sentences: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven, whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel;
Wolaitta Sentences: Tumu kiitai wonggelee koiro inttekko yiido wode, Xoossai sinttappe immana giidoogaa siyideta. Simmi intte ammanoinne siiqoi saluwan giigidi naagiya, Xoossai sinttappe immana giidoogan doomettiis.

English Sentences: Which is come unto you, as it is in all the world; and bringeth forth fruit, as it doth also in you, since the day ye heard of it, and knew the grace of God in truth:
Wolaitta Sentences: He wonggelee inttekko gakkiis; gakkidi, intte a siyoosappenne Xoossaa aaro kehatettaa tumatettan eroosappe doommidi, intte giddon de7iyoogaadankka, biitta ubban anjjuwaa eheesinne ubbasaa aakkees.

English Sentences: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant, who is for you a faithful minister of Christ;
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte hegaa nunaara issippe ashkkara gidida siiqo Eppaafirappe tamaarideta; i nu gishshaa Kiristtoosayyo ammanettidi oottiyaagee,

English Sentences: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa Ayyaanan harata intte siiqiyoogaa nuuyyo yootiis.

English Sentences: For this cause we also, since the day we heard it, do not cease to pray for you, and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, nuuni qassi hegaa siyido gallassaasappe doommidi, Xoossai intteyyo ba sheniyaa eriyo eratettaa, Xoossaa Ayyaanai immiyo aadhdhida eratettaaranne akeekaara issippe kunttidi immanaadan, ubba wode balennan Xoossaa woossoos.

English Sentences: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing, being fruitful in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Godai koyiyoogaadan intte de7anaunne, ubba wode a ufaissiyaabaa oottanau danddayana; intte oottiyo lo77o ooso ubban intte de7oi go77aara de7iyaagaa gidana; qassi Xoossaa eriyoogan intte diccana.

English Sentences: Strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power, unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness;
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ubbaban ufaissan genccanaadaaninne danddayanaadan, Xoossai ba bonchchuwaa gitaadan immiyo wolqqa ubban minnite.

English Sentences: Giving thanks unto the Father, which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi geeshshatuyyo giigida poo7o kawotettaa laattanau, nuna danddayissida Aawaa galatite.

English Sentences: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness, and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son:
Wolaitta Sentences: I nuna xumaa wolqqaappe ashshidi, ba siiqiyo Na7aa kawotettaakko pinttiis.

English Sentences: In whom we have redemption through his blood, even the forgiveness of sins:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi i ba Na7an nuna wozidi, nu nagaraa atto giis.

English Sentences: Who is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of every creature:
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiristtoosi beettenna Xoossaa leemiso; i merettidabaa ubbaappe aadhdhiya baira Na7a.

English Sentences: For by him were all things created, that are in heaven, and that are in earth, visible and invisible, whether they be thrones, or dominions, or principalities, or powers: all things were created by him, and for him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ubbabaikka aani merettiis; beettiyaageeti, beettennaageeti, ayyaanatuppe beettiya wolqqainne godatettai, halaqatettainne maatai, saluwaaninne sa7an de7iya ubbabaikka aaninne ayyo merettiis.

English Sentences: And he is before all things, and by him all things consist.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ubbabaappe kase de7iis; ubbabaikka aani ba sohuwaa sohuwaa oiqqidi de7ees.

English Sentences: And he is the head of the body, the church: who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead; that in all things he might have the preeminence.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba bollau, woosa keettau huuphe; i ubbaappe bolla gidana mala, kasetidi haiquwaappe denddida baira Na7a gidiis.

English Sentences: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell;
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xoossai koyidoogaadan, aani Xoossatetta mereta kumettai de7ees.

English Sentences: And, having made peace through the blood of his cross, by him to reconcile all things unto himself; by him, I say, whether they be things in earth, or things in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin Xoossai Kiristtoosa baggaara ubbabaa banaara sigettanau yohuwaa qachchiis; ba Na7ai masqqaliyaa bollan gussido suuttan saluwaaninne sa7an de7iya ubbabaa banaara sigettiis.

English Sentences: And you, that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works, yet now hath he reconciled
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaappe kase, intte iitabaa oottido gishshaunne qoppido gishshau, Xoossaappe shaahettidi, aara morkkettideta.

English Sentences: In the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai ha77i inttena pokkoinne boree bainnaageetanne qassi geeshshata oottidi, ba sintti shiishshanau, ba Na7aa haiqqidaagaa asatettan banaara inttena sigettiis.

English Sentences: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled, and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel, which ye have heard, and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven; whereof I Paul am made a minister;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee intte tumu ammanuwan minni eqqidi, wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa siyidi, sinttappe ekkana giidoogaappe qaaxxennan minnidi de7ikko hanana; he wonggeliyaa mishiraachchoi sa7an de7iya mereta ubbaa matan odettiis. Taani PHauloosikka wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiyaagaa gidaas.

English Sentences: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you, and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body's sake, which is the church:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo waayettido gishshau, ha77i ufaittais; Kiristtoosi ba bollaayyo, hegaa giyoogee woosa keettaayyo, waayettishin paccidaagaa taani ta bollaa sahuwan kunttais.

English Sentences: Whereof I am made a minister, according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you, to fulfil the word of God;
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai tana intte gishshau, woosa keettaa Ayyaanan kaalettiyaagaa oottido gishshau, a qaalaa polada yootana mala, taani woosa keettau ashkkara gidaas.

English Sentences: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations, but now is made manifest to his saints:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha qaalai hagaappe kase bagga ubban, asa ubbau erettennan geemmidi de7ees; shin ba geeshshatuyyo Xoossai ha77i qonccissiis.

English Sentences: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles; which is Christ in you, the hope of glory:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Aihuda gidenna asaayyo wottido ha asaayyo qonccibeenna bonchchonne dure yohoi aibakko geeshshata erissanau koyiis; ha asaayyo qonccibeennaagee aibee giikko, Kiristtoosi inttenan de7iyoogaa; hegaa giyoogee Xoossaa bonchchuwaa aara intte ekkanaagaa.

English Sentences: Whom we preach, warning every man, and teaching every man in all wisdom; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, nuuni asa ubbau Kiristtoosabaa yootoos; asa ubbaa Kiristtoosan kumetta asa oottidi, Xoossaakko shiishshana mala, nuuyyo aadhdhida eratetta ubban inttena ye77e goosinne tamaarissoos.

English Sentences: Whereunto I also labour, striving according to his working, which worketh in me mightily.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hagaa polanau, tanan oottiya Kiristtoosi taayyo immiyo wolqqan baaxetaisinne daafurais.

English Sentences: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you, and for them at Laodicea, and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh;
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo, Lodooqiyaa giyo kataman de7iya asaayyoonne tana be7ibeenna asa ubbaayyo ai keenaa baaxetidaakkonne intte erana mala koyais.

English Sentences: That their hearts might be comforted, being knit together in love, and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding, to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God, and of the Father, and of Christ;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta wozanai minnana mala, siiquwan issippe gididi, tumu akeekan beettiya duretettaa ubbaa eti ekkana malanne qassi eti Xoossai asaayyo qonccissibeennaagaa, Kiristtoosa a huuphen erana mala, taani daafurais.

English Sentences: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geeman Xoossai minjjido erainne aadhdhida eratettai ubbai aani de7ees.

English Sentences: And this I say, lest any man should beguile you with enticing words.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooninne inttena cimo qaalan balettenna mala, taani inttena hassayissais.

English Sentences: For though I be absent in the flesh, yet am I with you in the spirit, joying and beholding your order, and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani intte matappe haakkada de7ikkokka, ayyaanan inttenaara de7ais; intte de7iyo maaraanne Kiristtoosa intte minnidi ammaniyoogaa be7ada ufaittais.

English Sentences: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord, so walk ye in him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi intte Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa ekkidoogaadan, aani de7ite.

English Sentences: Rooted and built up in him, and stablished in the faith, as ye have been taught, abounding therein with thanksgiving.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aani xaphuwaa yeddidi diccite; intte tamaaridoogaadan ammanuwan minnite; Xoossaa ubba wode galatite.

English Sentences: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit, after the tradition of men, after the rudiments of the world, and not after Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiristtoosappe gidenna timirttiyan, ha sa7aa haariya ayyaanatu timirttiyaaninne, asappe yiida eratettan, qassi mela cimuwan inttena ooninne omooddenna mala naagettite.

English Sentences: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Kiristtoosa bollan Xoossatetta mereta kumettai de7ees.

English Sentences: And ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi halaqatettaayyoonne godatettaayyo ubbaayyo huuphe gidiya Kiristtoosappe kumetta de7uwaa demmideta.

English Sentences: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands, in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ:
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte Kiristtoosaara issi asa mala gididi, asa qaxxara mala gidennan, intte iita hanotettaa diggiyo qaxxaraa, Kiristtoosan qaxxarettideta.

English Sentences: Buried with him in baptism, wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God, who hath raised him from the dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte xammaqettido wode, Kiristtoosaara moogettidi, Kiristtoosa haiquwaappe denttida Xoossaa wolqqaa ammanido gishshau, xinqqatiyan Kiristtoosaara issippe denddideta.

English Sentences: And you, being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh, hath he quickened together with him, having forgiven you all trespasses;
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte intte naaquwaaninne intte asatettaa qaxxarettennan aggidoogan haiqqidi de7iyo wode, Xoossai intte naaquwaa atto giidi, Kiristtoosaara inttena paxa wottiis.

English Sentences: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us, which was contrary to us, and took it out of the way, nailing it to his cross;
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuna ixxiya, acuwaa paramaa a maachchaara issippe Xoossai daakkiis; daakkidi, masqqaliyaa bollan xishidi, ogiyaappe diggiis.

English Sentences: And having spoiled principalities and powers, he made a shew of them openly, triumphing over them in it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiristtoosi he masqqaliyan halaqatuppenne godatuppe wolqqaa wotti ekkidi, eta omooddidoogaa asa ubbaa qoncciyan yuushshi bessiis.

English Sentences: Let no man therefore judge you in meat, or in drink, or in respect of an holyday, or of the new moon, or of the sabbath days:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, meettan woi ushshan, baala gallassaa woi aginai xeeriyo wodiyaa bonchchiyoogan, woi Sambbataa bonchchiyoogan, ooninne intte bolli pirddoppo.

English Sentences: Which are a shadow of things to come; but the body is of Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti sinttappe yaana yohotu eesho; shin bollai Kiristtoosaagaa.

English Sentences: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels, intruding into those things which he hath not seen, vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind,
Wolaitta Sentences: Wordduwaa ashkke milatanaunne kiitanchchaayyo goinnanau koyiyaagee, be7ibeennaagaa ajjuutan be7aas giidi otorettiyaagee, asatetta qofan coo ayyiyaagee, ooninne intte bolli pirddoppo.

English Sentences: And not holding the Head, from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered, and knit together, increaseth with the increase of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa mala asi huuphe gidiya Kiristtoosa mintti oiqqidoogaa lefissees. Bolla ubbai he huuphiyaappe wolqqaa demmidi, bollan de7iya kuriyaaranne shayaara issippe ohettidi, Xoossai dichchiyo dishuwaadan diccees.

English Sentences: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world, why, as though living in the world, are ye subject to ordinances,
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ha sa7aa haariya ayyaanatuppe haakkidi, Kiristtoosaara haiqqideta; yaatin, aissi ha sa7aa wogan de7iya asadan de7eetii?

English Sentences: (Touch not; taste not; handle not;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Oiqqoppa; baara be7oppa; bochchoppa" yaagiya higgetuyyo aissi azazetteetii?

English Sentences: Which all are to perish with the using;) after the commandments and doctrines of men?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha ubbabaikka asi medhdhido higgenne timirtte gidiyo gishshau, polettoogaappe guyyiyan xayana.

English Sentences: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship, and humility, and neglecting of the body; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti kiitanchchaayyo goinniyoogaaninne wordduwaa ashkke milatiyoogan qassi bantta asatettaa gilqqissiyoogan aadhdhida eranchcha milatoosona; shin shaaramuxanau koyiyoogaa diggiyoogee hegan ainne go77enna.

English Sentences: If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi intte Kiristtoosaara haiquwaappe denddidobaa gidikko, Xoossaappe ushachcha baggaara uttida Kiristtoosi de7iyoosan saluwan de7iyaagaa mintti koyite.

English Sentences: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwan de7iyaagaa intte qoppanaappe attin, sa7an de7iyaagaa qoppoppite.

English Sentences: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, intte haiqqideta; qassi intte de7oi Xoossan Kiristtoosaara geemmiis.

English Sentences: When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intteyyo de7o gidida Kiristtoosi qoncciyo wode, he wode inttekka aara bonchchuwan qonccana.

English Sentences: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth; fornication, uncleanness, inordinate affection, evil concupiscence, and covetousness, which is idolatry:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, inttenan de7iya ha sa7aa amota worite; hegeetikka shaaramuxiyoogaa, tunatettaa, shaaramuxanau koyiyoogaa, iita amuwaa, miishsha amottiyoogaa. Miishsha amottiyoogee eeqau goinniyoogaappe dummatenna.

English Sentences: For which things' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageetu gaasuwan, Xoossai azazettenna asata hanqqettana.

English Sentences: In the which ye also walked some time, when ye lived in them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kase intte ha iita qofatun de7iyo wode etan haarettideta.

English Sentences: But now ye also put off all these; anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy communication out of your mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha77i intte qassi hanqquwaa, yiilluwaa, ixuwaa, intte doonaappe kiyiya cashshaanne yeellayiya haasayaa hageeta ubbaa intteppe xaissite.

English Sentences: Lie not one to another, seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds;
Wolaitta Sentences: Issoi issuwau worddotoppite; aissi giikko, ceega meretaa a oosuwaara intteppe xaissirggidi,

English Sentences: And have put on the new man, which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai, a medhdhidaagee, bana milatissanaunne baayyo de7iya eratetta ubbaa immanau, ubba wode ooraxissiyo ooratta meretaa maayideta.

English Sentences: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcision nor uncircumcision, Barbarian, Scythian, bond nor free: but Christ is all, and in all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha ooratta meretan, Giriike asa woi Aihuda asa, qaxxarettidaagaa woi qaxxarettibeennaagaa, ammanoi bainnaageetanne ainne tamaaribeennaagaa, aille woi goqa giidi shaakkiyoobi baawa; Kiristtoosi ubbabaa; i ubbankka de7ees.

English Sentences: Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Xoossai dooridoogeetudan, geeshshanne siiqidoogeeta gididi, maarotettaa, qaretaa, kehatettaa, intte huuphiyaa kaushshiyoogaa, ashkketettaanne danddayaa maayite.

English Sentences: Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issoi issuwaabaa danddayite; ooninne ba laggiyaa bolli hanqqettidobai de7ikko, issoi issuwau atto yaago. Kiristtoosi intteyyo atto giidoogaadan, inttekka atto giite.

English Sentences: And above all these things put on charity, which is the bond of perfectness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa ubbaa bolli, ubbabaa issippe shiishshi qachchiya siiquwaa maayite.

English Sentences: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body; and be ye thankful.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiristtoosi immiyo sarotettai inttena haaro; aissi giikko, Xoossai inttena issi asa oottidi, he sarotettau xeesiis. Xoossaa galatite.

English Sentences: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiristtoosa qaalai intte wozanan kumidi de7o; intteyyo de7iya aadhdhida eratetta ubban issoi issuwaa tamaarissitenne zorite; intte wozanan Xoossaa galatiiddi, xalotiyaanne mazamuriyaa, Xoossaa sunttaa xoqqu oottiya yettaa yexxite.

English Sentences: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God and the Father by him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ai haasayiyaabaa woi ai oottiyaabaa gidikkokka, Aawaa Xoossaa Yesuusa baggaara galatiiddi, oottiyoobaa ubbaa Godaa Yesuusa sunttan oottite.

English Sentences: Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as it is fit in the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasatoo, ammaniya asau bessiyaagaadan, intte azinatuyyo haarettite.

English Sentences: Husbands, love your wives, and be not bitter against them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Attumaasatoo, intte maccaasaa siiqite; etaara woppu giidi de7ite.

English Sentences: Children, obey your parents in all things: for this is well pleasing unto the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naatoo, inttena yelidaageetuyyo ubbaban azazettite. Aissi giikko, intte etau azazettiyoogee Xoossaa daro ufaissees.

English Sentences: Fathers, provoke not your children to anger, lest they be discouraged.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aawatoo, intte naati wozanaa bayenna mala, eta yiilloyoppite.

English Sentences: Servants, obey in all things your masters according to the flesh; not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but in singleness of heart, fearing God:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ailletoo, sa7an intteyyo goda gidiyaageetuyyo ubbaban azazettite; Godau yayyidi, suure wozanan oottiteppe attin, asa ufaissanaunne asi be7o giyoogan azazettiyaageeta gidoppite.

English Sentences: And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte oottiyo ooso ubbaa asau gidennan Godau oottiyoogaadan, wozanappe oottite.

English Sentences: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa Kiristtoosayyo intte oottiyo gishshau, i baageetuyyo immanau giigissi wottidoogaa intte laattanaagaa akeekite.

English Sentences: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done: and there is no respect of persons.
Wolaitta Sentences: Balabaa oottida urai ooninne, ba oottido balaadan woituwaa ekkana; aissi giikko, Xoossai pirddiiddi, oonanne maaddenna.

English Sentences: Masters, give unto your servants that which is just and equal; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godatoo, intteyyookka saluwan Godai de7iyoogaa eridi, intte ailletuyyo xillotettaaninne suuretettan koshshiyaabaa oottite.

English Sentences: Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving;
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa aggennan woossite; qassi woossiiddi azallennan, a galatiiddi woossite.

English Sentences: Withal praying also for us, that God would open unto us a door of utterance, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in bonds:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi intte woossiyo wode ubban, kaseesappe asayyo qonccibeennabaa, Kiristtoosabaa nuuni yootana mala, Xoossai nuuyyo injjeyanaadan, nuuyyookka Xoossaa woossite; aissi giikko, ha77i taani qasho keettan de7iyoogee hegaassa.

English Sentences: That I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka taani bessiyaagaa keenaa qonccissada ha yohuwaa yootana mala, taayyo Xoossaa woossite.

English Sentences: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without, redeeming the time.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intteyyo de7iya wodiyaa go77i bainnasan xaissennan, ammanennaageetu matan hayyottidi de7ite.

English Sentences: Let your speech be alway with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte asa ubbau waati zaaranau bessiyaakko erana mala, intte haasayai ubba wode, siyanau kehiyaagaanne ufaissiyaagaa gidanau bessees.

English Sentences: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you, who is a beloved brother, and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord:
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu siiqo ishai Tikiqoosi, tanaara issippe Godaa oosuwan ashkkara gidida ammanettiya oosanchchai, ta de7uwaabaa inttena erissana.

English Sentences: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that he might know your estate, and comfort your hearts;
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a inttekko kiittiyoogee, nuuni waani de7iyaakko intteyyo i yootidi, inttena minttettana gishshassa.

English Sentences: With Onesimus, a faithful and beloved brother, who is one of you. They shall make known unto you all things which are done here.
Wolaitta Sentences: Anaasimoosi, ammanettiya siiqo ishai, intte biittaagee, aara issippe inttekko bees; eti hagan haniya ubbabaa inttena erissana.

English Sentences: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you, and Marcus, sister's son to Barnabas, (touching whom ye received commandments: if he come unto you, receive him;)
Wolaitta Sentences: Tanaara qashuwan de7iya Arisxxirokoosinne Barnnaabaasayyo ishaa na7ai Marqqoosi inttena saro de7eetii goosona; taani inttena kase azazidoogaadan, Marqqoosi inttekko biikko, wozanappe a mokkite.

English Sentences: And Jesus, which is called Justus, who are of the circumcision. These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God, which have been a comfort unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yosxxoosa giyo Yesuusikka inttena saro saro gees; Aihuda asatuppe tanaara Xoossaa kawotettaayyo oottiyai, ha heezzu asatuppe harai baawa; hageeti tana daro maaddidosona.

English Sentences: Epaphras, who is one of you, a servant of Christ, saluteth you, always labouring fervently for you in prayers, that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eppaafiri, intte biittaagee, Kiristtoos Yesuusa ashkkarai, inttena saro saro gees. I intte Xoossan minnidi eqqanaadaaninne Xoossai koyiyoobai ubbai aibakko eridi, poli ammananaadan, ubba wode Xoossaa mintti woossees.

English Sentences: For I bear him record, that he hath a great zeal for you, and them that are in Laodicea, and them in Hierapolis.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i intteyyo, Lodooqiyaa asaayyoonne Hirapoliisa giyo katamaa asaayyo daro daafuriyoogaa taani markkattais.

English Sentences: Luke, the beloved physician, and Demas, greet you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu siiqo dottoree Luqaasinne Deemaasi inttena saro de7eetii yaagoosona.

English Sentences: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea, and Nymphas, and the church which is in his house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Lodooqiyan de7iya nu ishanttuyyoonne Nimppiyyo qassi i keettan shiiqiya asaayyo nu sarotaa yootite.

English Sentences: And when this epistle is read among you, cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha dabddaabbiyaa intte nabbabidoogaappe guyyiyan, Lodooqiyaa woosa keettankka nabbabissite; inttekka Lodooqiyaa woosa keettaikka intteyyo yeddiyo dabddaabbiyaa nabbabite.

English Sentences: And say to Archippus, Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord, that thou fulfil it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Arkkipoosayyo, "Godai neeyyo immido oosuwaa polanaagaa dogoppa" yaagidi yootite.

English Sentences: The salutation by the hand of me Paul. Remember my bonds. Grace be with you. Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani PHauloosi, ta kushiyan saro gaada xaafidoogaa hagaa be7ite; taani qashuwan de7iyoogaa dogoppite. Xoossaa aaro kehatettai inttenaara gido.
